EmailTemplate.name: BSP RR Missed 1st Attempt
EmailTemplate.subject: Enter Subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I was unable to reach you for your Roadmap Review at your scheduled time: DATE-TIME
As a business owner, I know it can be difficult to maintain your busy schedule. However, this Roadmap Review is important—it will allow you to better understand the attorney’s recommendations, as well as demonstrate how LegalZoom can help successfully launch your business.
If you have any questions or you are ready to reschedule your Roadmap Review, please call me directly at (855) 787-1951 x{!User.Extension}, Monday–Friday from 6 am – 6pm PT or simply reply to his message. If I’m unavailable, you can also email bizhelp@legalzoom.com to reach the next available member of my team.
As your dedicated Account Manager, I'll be your primary point of contact for all your business formation needs. Thank you again for reaching out to LegalZoom. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.FirstName} Business Account Manager (855) 787-1951 x{!User.Extension} BizHelp@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
